about.title: About Us
about.txt:
Welcome to TecnoFibras, a family business passionately committed to manufacturing high-quality, elegant fiberglass products.

For over 20 years, we have dedicated ourselves to the art of crafting exceptional fiberglass creations that seamlessly merge form and function.

Our legacy is deeply rooted in a love for innovation and a relentless pursuit of excellence, ensuring every piece we create reflects the values of quality and craftsmanship we stand for.
